      • purchaseSwag

        public int purchaseSwag(Swag s)
        Merchant purchases the Swag from the player and returns the price
        Parameters:
        s - the Swag the merchant purchases
        Returns:
        the swag's value / 2, truncated as an integer

      • sellSwag

        public Swag sellSwag(Swag s)
        Uses the SwagFactory to create a new instance of the Swag item that will be sold by the merchant. Does no checking if the merchant has the item in the inventory
        Parameters:
        s - The Swag the merchant is selling
        Returns:
        a new instance of the Swag the merchant is selling
